name: Medal Of Valor D-Day NO ADS
name_original: Medal Of Valor D-Day NO ADS
description:
Answer the call to duty and endure the Allied invasion of German-occupied France in the Normandy landings of June 6th, 1944. Play as multiple soldiers as they set foot on the much contested Omaha Beach. Fight alongside a hundred allied troopers and experience the unique mental health meter, realistic visuals and gritty world war 2 atmosphere. Play the most advanced Medal Of Valor game to date!

* No Ads
* High quality 3D visuals
* Fight alongside a hundred allied soldiers
* Unique mental health meter
* New Unique animations
* Varied WW2 weapons
